document.title: Schneider Electric Modicon M340 PLC (Update A)

product.name: Quantum CPUs with firmware: prior to v3.52
M580 CPUs with firmware: prior to v2.3
M340 CPUs with firmware: prior to v2.9

notes.text: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability has been identified, which may allow remote code execution.CVE-2017-6017 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.5 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: Set up a firewall blocking all remote/external access to Port 502
For more information Schneider Electric has released a security notification that can be found at: https://www.schneider-electric.com/en/download/document/SEVD-2017-048-02/
